yell.name: Gig'em
yell.passback: Closed fist with thumb pointed straight up

yell.name: Aggies
yell.passback: Hands flat, with index fingers and thumbs touching to form an A

yell.name: Farmers Fight
yell.passback: Closed fists rotating around each other in alternating directions
yell.call:
Farmers fight!
Farmers fight!
Fight! Fight
Farmers, farmers fight!

yell.name: Locomotive
yell.passback: Hand looks to be pulling a train whistle, reaching upward and twisting on downward motion
yell.call:
(slow) Rah! Rah! Rah! Rah! T-A-M-C
(faster) Rah! Rah! Rah! Rah! T-A-M-C
(very fast) Rah! Rah! Rah! Rah! T-A-M-C
(seniors only: whoop!) Aaaaaa Rah! Rah! Rah! Rah! Team!

yell.name: Beat the Hell
yell.passback: Left arm clapping bicep, Right arm pulling up, fist clenched

yell.name: Old Army
yell.passback: Upward pointed finger moves in circular motion
yell.call:
Aaaa, Rrrr, Mmmm, Yyyy(Drop voice)
Tttt, Aaaa, Mmmm, Cccc(Drop voice)
Aaaaaaaa ol’ Army fight!

yell.name: Kyle Field
yell.passback: Left hand raised with waving motion, right hand at your side with index fnger pointing to the ground
yell.call:
K-Y-L-E
F-I-E-L-D
Aaaaaaaaaaaaaa
Kyle Field, Aaaa

yell.name: Sky Rocket
yell.passback: Slap hands together with right hand moving upward and index finer pointed to the sky

yell.name: Aggie War Hymn
yell.passback:
Hullabaloo, Caneck! Caneck! Hullabaloo, Caneck! Caneck!All hail to dear old Texas A&M
Rally around Maroon and White
Good luck to dear old Texas Aggies
They are the boys who show the real old fight
That good old Aggie spirit thrills us
And makes us yell and yell and yell
So let’s fight for dear old Texas A&M
We’re going to beat you all to
Chig-gar-roo-gar-rem
Chig-gar-roo-gar-rem
Rough Tough! Real Stuff! Texas A&M!

Good-bye to texas university
So long to the orange and the white
Good luck to dear old Texas Aggies
They are the boys that show the real old fight
“The eyes of Texas are upon you . . .”
That is the song they sing so well
So good-bye to texas university
We’re going to beat you all to
Chig-gar-roo-gar-rem
Chig-gar-roo-gar-rem
Rough Tough! Real Stuff! Texas A&M!
